body_html: I suppose it would be nice to give an example on how to prepare a sequence of labels (e.g. characters of a sentence) to be encoded using some character set, and converted into a SparseTensor to be passed into the ctc loss function.
body_text: I suppose it would be nice to give an example on how to prepare a sequence of labels (e.g. characters of a sentence) to be encoded using some character set, and converted into a SparseTensor to be passed into the ctc loss function.
body: I suppose it would be nice to give an example on how to prepare a sequence of labels (e.g. characters of a sentence) to be encoded using some character set, and converted into a `SparseTensor` to be passed into the ctc loss function.
